::Scorponok::

Scorponok leaped up and summersaulted forward, avoiding the lasers. Back on his knees, Scorponok takes a big swipe at Remus with his large mechanical pincer arm.

khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:                               The hit of the blast made Remus hovvering backward. While still stable
 in this form he quickly glide to his rigth while he shot two laser at
 scorponok.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Scorponok::
 > 
 > The two missiles are a hit. One strikes his tail with withstands
 most of the force. The other blats him in the back sending him
 stumbling forward. Once recovered Scorponok spins around.
 > 
 > Scorponok: Who dares strike me!!!!!!!!!!!!
 > 
 > He spots Remus and locks on with his tail blaster, releasing a shot
 like the ones he was shooting at the city.
 > 
 > khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:                               As soon
 the position of Scorponok was identify, Remus transformed in
 >  his hover mode reday to go into the action. When he saw Scorponok
 >  firing in the air, he knew that is best chance was a good surprise
 >  hit. So, he decided to take the long way around to have the best
 >  possibility for a backhit. When he was in possition, he shot two
 >  missile hoping that scorponok hadn't noticed him.
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ::Scorponok::
 >  > 
 >  > Scorponok moved back a bit and took in the sights and sounds of
 >  combat. This was a good sized and well trained Predacon attack force.
 >  > 
 >  > Scorponok too position and allowed his body mounted gun batteries to
 >  open fire on the swarming Maximal fliers.
 >  > 
 >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                               OOC:
 >  Lol! So true! Now who'll be the first for a Targetmaster? Or
 >  >  worse, a Powermaster!
 >  >  
 >  >  BIC: 
 >  >  
 >  >  As soon as Scorponok resurfaced, Deadfur received a report about it
 >  >  from one of the Ground crew.
 >  >  
 >  >  Deadfur: Alright, Remus. You want your chance, there it is! Go! [To
 >  >  the command center] Can anybody get me Lord Razorwing?
 >  >  
 >  >  But at the same time, the Airtankers arrived in visibility range of
 >  >  the city. The fliers, seeing the newcomers, moved in to
 intercept, but
 >  >  the attackers knew their stuff. Gunrain quickly dodged between the
 >  >  fliers and took out a lot of the defenders with his multiple guns,
 >  >  while Skysword did not even bother with dodging, rather
 preferring to
 >  >  ram and slice his opponents with his sharp wings. Bombtube took
 to the
 >  >  air, immediately attracting attention, but Lock-on gave him some
 cover
 >  >  with her saturation missiles. Because of that, he managed to bombard
 >  >  the shields, weakening them dangerously.
 >  >  
 >  >  Motherload, however, was still behind, not fast enough to engage in
 >  >  any kind of dogfight, but still armed enough to be left alone
 for the
 >  >  moment.
 >  >  
 >  >  Motherload: Is this it, My Lord? Are these all the city's defenses?
 >  >  Why did you even bother us? I was going to trick them all and
 win the
 >  >  jackpot this time!
 >  >  
 >  >  Jotunn: Silence, Motherload. This is only the prelude. You will see
 >  >  the reason I brought you here soon if Razorwing doesn't do what's
 >  >  right for everyone.
 >  >  
 >  >  He pressed a button and opened a channel to Relay's command center.
 >  >  
 >  >  Jotunn: Lord Razorwing, this is your last opportunity. You still
 have
 >  >  a chance to spare millions of civilians and to keep your valiant
 >  >  soldiers online. Surrender and we will not harm them.
 >  >  
 >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >  >
 >  >  > OOC: No. Once the Predacons arrived Scorponok jumped out to the
 >  >  surface and transformed to robot mode with Zarak becoming the head.
 >  >  Woot for me being the first to bring a Headmaster into NBW... I
 think.
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                                  OOC:
 >  >  Before I reply, Rick, can you tell me where Scorponok was last
 >  >  >  time he appeared? Was he still underground?
 >  >  >  
 >  >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@> wrote:
 >  >  >  >
 >  >  >  > ooc: Hi guys, finally back to normal (YAY!) 
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > bic: 
 >  >  >  > Remus: I'll take to crazy bot, just need is last location!
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 >  >  >  > >
 >  >  >  > > Deadfur turned to Remus: What's going on? It's a frickin'
 >  >  attack, what
 >  >  >  > > else? We've got us a furious bot down there, trying to
 blow us
 >  >  up for
 >  >  >  > > some reason, and more Preds coming in. Small number of
 >  those, mind
 >  >  >  > > you, but I know Jotunn's not a fool. This means something
 bad,
 >  >  but I
 >  >  >  > > don't know what. So, Remus, pick your target and go!
 >  >  >  > > 
 >  >  >  > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 >  >  >  > > >
 >  >  >  > > > ooc: Hi everyone i'm (kham) using my brother's acount
 >  unitl some
 >  >  >  > > > technical problem are fixed.
 >  >  >  > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > bic: While Remus was in the CR chamber, he tought about his
 >  >  >  coming to
 >  >  >  > > > this planet:to earth. The on thing he couldn`t explain
 was his
 >  >  >  > > > survival from a crash without any protection other than
 is own
 >  >  >  body...
 >  >  >  > > >     on top of that he have no memory of anything that
 happen
 >  >  before.
 >  >  >  > > > Where do he come from? why? Do he have any mission here? 
 >  >  >  > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > Has he was thinking, the sound of an attack cut the
 flow of is
 >  >  >  tough.
 >  >  >  > > > Eager to go help Deadfur, Remus rushed out of the
 Building as
 >  >  >  soon as
 >  >  >  > > > the CR bipped.
 >  >  >  > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > Running toward Deadfur he yelled : DEADFUR! WHAT THE
 HELL IS
 >  >  >  GOING ON
 >  >  >  > > > HERE?
 >  >  >  > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@>
 >  >  wrote:
 >  >  >  > > > >
 >  >  >  > > > > ::Scorponok/Zarak::
 >  >  >  > > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > > Scorponok is moving about trying to avoid as much
 damage as
 >  >  >  possible
 >  >  >  > > > but was taking shots from the fliers. To protect himself
 >  >  Scorponok
 >  >  >  > > > burows into the ground somewhat and shoots another fusion
 >  blast
 >  >  >  at the
 >  >  >  > > > city along with the two rockets he fired.(My last post
 >  with him.
 >  >  >  They
 >  >  >  > > > should still be in flight.)
 >  >  >  > > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > > Scorponok completely burows underground to avoid the
 "rock
 >  >  drop"
 >  >  >  > > > bombs. The ground is being ripped up above him.
 >  >  >  > > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > > Zarak has now crawled into a cockpit like part on
 Scorponok.
 >  >  >  > > > > 
 >  >  >  > > > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                          
       
 >  >  >  > > > Deadfur: Just great... How about a Minion attack while
 >  everyone
 >  >  >  else's
 >  >  >  > > > >  at it?
 >  >  >  > > > >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  He opened the Maximal only frenquency.
 >  >  >  > > > >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  Deadfur: Troops, this is Deadfur speaking. We have a
 >  report of

 >  >  >  > > > >  wave of Preds coming in. We have to get rid of that
 >  giant bug
 >  >  >  > before
 >  >  >  > > > >  they get here, unless some of you can manage to turn
 >  him the
 >  >  >  > > other way
 >  >  >  > > > >  around. For now, continue with hit-and-run. Try to
 >  sneak up on
 >  >  >  > > him and
 >  >  >  > > > >  to plant some bombs there. Engineering, how's the shield
 >  >  >  comin' up?
 >  >  >  > > > >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  Officer: Slowly, commander. We don't have the city
 covered
 >  >  yet,
 >  >  >  > > but we
 >  >  >  > > > >  do have defenses over the gravitaion nullifiers. It
 >  will take
 >  >  >  a lot
 >  >  >  > > > >  before they shoot us down from the skies.
 >  >  >  > > > >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  Deafur: Good, keep working on it. Keep up the efforts,
 >  >  soldiers!
 >  >  >  > > > >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  The small fliers were buzzing quickly around Skorponok,
 >  >  >  > strafing him
 >  >  >  > > > >  with lasers and missiles, while higher up, a team was

 >  >  >  > "rock
 >  >  >  > > > >  drop" technique. They were miles high above the
 >  Decepticon and
 >  >  >  > > > >  dropping small but heavy bombs that would generate a
 bigger
 >  >  >  impact
 >  >  >  > > > >  because of the altitude...
 >  >  >  > > > >

 <roborick007@>
 >  >  >  wrote:
 >  >  >  > > > >  >
 >  >  >  > > > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 >  >  >  > > > >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  > Elder thinks over this change in events before

 your way.
 >  >  >  > Since you
 >  >  >  > > > >  are on site and assisting the Maximals I'm scrapping
 >  the 'no
 >  >  >  > > > >  interference' order. I'm on my way and I'll try and
 get as

 >  >  >  > back
 >  >  >  > > > >  up as possible.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >

 >  >  >  > > > >  > Elder: Watchers, this is Lord Elder. One of our
 ranks is
 >  >  >  > directing
 >  >  >  > > > >  the defense of the Maximal City Relay. They are faced
 >  with a
 >  >  >  > > > >  Decepticon attack and a coming Predacon assualt. They
 >  are to
 >  >  >  > recieve
 >  >  >  > > > >  are full aid. I'm going there myself. Elder out.
 >  >  >  > > > >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  > He closes communications and heads for the exit. Only
 >  >  >  > Watchers know
 >  >  >  > > > >  how to survive the harsh lands around their base. Avoid
 >  them.
 >  >  >  > > > >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  > Elder leaves Cryonosis in a small shuttle pod that
 >  will get
 >  >  >  > him to
 >  >  >  > > > >  the main land.
 >  >  >  > > > >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                          
 >        
 >  >  >  > > > >  Deadfur got the message on the Watchers-only frequency.
 >  He was
 >  >  >  > > not too
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  pleased with the news. As soon as he could, he
 opened a
 >  >  line
 >  >  >  > with
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  Cryonosis.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  Deadfur: Deadfur reporting. I'm assisting the
 Maxies in
 >  >  Relay
 >  >  >  > > as per
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  emergency protocols and I'm directing the defenses
 >  against
 >  >  >  that
 >  >  >  > > > brute.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  I require further instructions and backups, my Lord.
 >  >  Oh, and
 >  >  >  > > > just how
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  large is that coming Pred force?
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  He ducked as something blew up nearby.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >

 off,
 >  >  >  > waking the
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  Watcher leader.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > Elder: What in the hell?
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > He checks the monitoring systems that The Watchers
 >  have
 >  >  >  set up
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  around the planet.
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > Elder: One of the Predacon camps looks like their
 >  >  >  > mobalizing to
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  attack Relay. Wonderful. Sometimes I think The

 signal.

 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > He opens a comm to his men.

 >  >  >  > > > >  >  > Elder: Watchers: I believe a new twist in these
 Beast

 >  >  involved
 >  >  >  > > > unless I
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  order it but I want to study the battle there. Right

 >  >  >  > > Silver
 >  >  >  > > > >  >  Wing Maximals are dealing with some kind of new
 >  Decepticon
 >  >  >  > but it
